info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 27 at 7:40PM EDT until June 27 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Peachtree City GA
info.description:
FFWFFC
The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Clayton County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Cobb County in north central Georgia... Western DeKalb County in north central Georgia... Central Fulton County in north central Georgia... West Central Gwinnett County in north central Georgia...
* Until 1045 PM EDT.
* At 740 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 3 inches in 1 hour. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Atlanta, Decatur, Peachtree Corners, City of South Fulton, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Smyrna, Dunwoody, East Point, Duluth, Forest Park, College Park, Chamblee, Norcross, Doraville, Clarkston, Hapeville and Avondale Estates.
This includes the following streams and drainages... Cobbs Creek, Bromolow Creek, Cauley Creek, Corn Creek, Fowler Branch, Intrenchment Creek, Henderson Mill Creek, Camp Creek, South River, Jackson Creek, North Fork Camp Creek, Suwanee Creek, Sweetwater Creek, Peavine Creek, South Fork Peachtree Creek, Chattahoochee River, North Fork Peachtree Creek, Ball Mill Creek, Big Creek, Morning Creek, Big Cotton Indian Creek, Nickajack Creek, Peachtree Creek, Proctor Creek, Upton Creek, Conley Creek, Copper Sandy Creek, Flint River, Lullwater Creek, Rocky Creek, Snapfinger Creek, Beaver Ruin Creek, Rottenwood Creek and Sugar Creek.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Clayton, GA; Cobb, GA; DeKalb, GA; Fulton, GA; Gwinnett, GA
